physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Four cases of hepatic adenomas with fibrolamellar carcinomas were identified. Histologically, the adenomas had the typical morphology of HNF1-Î± inactivated adenomas, and one had myxoid morphology. All four adenomas showed complete loss or significant reduction of liver fatty acid binding protein (LFABP) expression.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: In one case, five years after the adenoma resection, a fibrolamellar carcinoma developed in the same lobe of the liver.
